channel.title: Trouble running workstation for the first time
channel.description:
i'm running the the gateway and when i go to run the workstation it says
Failed to open a session for the virtual machine Whonix-Workstation.
The configured driver wasn't found. Either the necessary driver modules wasn't loaded, the name was misspelled, or it was a misconfiguration. (VERR_PDM_DRIVER_NOT_FOUND).
Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005) Component: ConsoleWrap Interface: IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}

item.title: Trouble running workstation for the first time
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Please regard this: https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=33196

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Trouble running workstation for the first time

item.title: Trouble running workstation for the first time
item.dc:creator: dylandeep420
item.description:
i’m running the the gateway and when i go to run the workstation it says

Failed to open a session for the virtual machine Whonix-Workstation.

The configured driver wasn’t found. Either the necessary driver modules wasn’t loaded, the name was misspelled, or it was a misconfiguration. (VERR_PDM_DRIVER_NOT_FOUND).

Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005)
Component: ConsoleWrap
Interface: IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}
